events.name: KopiJS 19th meetup

events.name: Lunch and Meet
events.description: We're holding a little meetup this Sunday so overseas visitors current in town for Devfest can meet the creative coding community! Place and time is at OneMaker Group space at the National Designer Centre 11am. Lunch will be served, so do RSVP!Â  Simon Swain from Sydney is joining to share about new developments on his simulation plaform Coldwar.io. Mathieu Henri otherwise known as 'p01' is a creative coding extraordinaire who has written 1k demos and 140 bytes js golfs. He will doing a live coding session! Big thanks to Zopim by Zendesk for sponsoring food and One Makers Group for hosting!
events.location: National Design Centre, 111 Middle Road, Singapore

events.name: Haskell mentorship session
events.description: We will finish type classes for real and move to simple data analysis app.
events.location: Hackerspace.SG, 344B King George's Ave, King George's Building, Singapore

events.name: Talk.CSS
events.description: Join us for our first Talk.CSS! Because we're new, we don't have a food sponsor so please get a bite to eat before you arrive. We'll try to keep our timing tight to make sure you arrive close to the start time. Use the hash tag #SingaporeCSS whenever the urge comes. CSS Shapes Chen Hui Jing@hj_chen Hui Jing played basketball for Malaysia for 6 years and before realising that CSS was better than all that physical activity. She is a senior developer at Publicis Singapore. Animating SVG Zell Liew@zellwk Zell has the wrong qualifications and shouldn't be here. Fortunately no one told him and he went and became a freelance web developer anyway. Priority Plus... Plus Chris Lienert@cliener Chris also has the wrong qualifications and shouldn't be here. No one told him either and, despite not wanting to work with computers, he became a web developer anyway. After too many years in the industry, he's currently working for insurance broker JLT.
